data.title: Geoff Love Big War Movie Themes UK Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: GEOFF LOVE & HIS ORCHESTRA Big War Movie Themes (1971 UK 12-track stereo LP, including funky pipe & slippers versions of Guns Of Navarone, Battle Of Britain, 633 Squadron & more, front laminated picture sleeve. The sleeve shows minor signs ofits age & the vinyl remains in Excellent condition with light play only MFP5171) Tracklisting & Info: 01. Colonel Bogey 02. Lawrence Of Arabia 03. Guns Of Navarone 04. Battle Of Britain 05. The Longest Day 06. Where Eagles Dare 07. 633 Squadron 08. The Dam Busters 09. The Great Escape March 10. The Green Berets Theme 11. Is Paris Burning? 12. Reach For The Sky Year of Release - 1971 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - MFP Catalogue No - MFP5171 Country of Origin - United Kingdom Availability - In Stock
